title: WCAS HISTORY 102-6-21 First-Year Seminar-American History

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Who are controversial people and how have their lives been depicted? This course examines seven controversial figures through memoir, biography, news accounts, films, and television series. They include activists like Grace Lee Boggs and Malcolm X, celebrities like Eddie Huang, and historical figures like Cesar Chavez. We will discuss narrative, storytelling, and hidden histories as we study their lives and the stories about their lives.
